introduction.p: Welcome to the Demo pages for XML-to-Bootstrap. This site is generated from the sample files included in the source code.

collapse.p: To get started with your own content, simply modify the source files in the src/ directory an rebuild. Don't worry, your modifications will not be overwritten by future updates of XML-to-Bootstrap.
Demo pages use an unmodified version of Bootstrap (default theme). Remember that all colors, fonts, etc. can be customized by modifying Bootstrap's _variables.scss file.
